projects.name: Emitly
projects.description: Emitly is a beautifully designed chat app that makes connecting with others effortless. With features like friends, contacts, and more, it offers everything you need for a smooth and engaging chatting experience. Best of all, Emitly works entirely in your browser â€” no downloads or installations required.

projects.name: VeyzenClient
projects.description: VeyzenClient is a sleek, modern, open-source Minecraft 1.8.9 Forge-based client currently in development. Designed for performance, stability, and customization, it enhances your gameplay experience while staying lightweight and user-friendly.

projects.name: Fatigue+
projects.description: Fatigue+ is a lightweight, immersive Minecraft mod that simulates sleep deprivation. Designed for Minecraft 1.8.9 (Forge) and built to work client-side only, this mod tracks how long you've stayed awake and progressively makes your experience more difficult.

projects.name: Display-API
projects.description: Display-API is a lightweight, dependency-free API for displaying BossBars, ActionBars, Titles, and Holograms in Minecraft 1.8.9 using native packets. Built for plugin developers who want full control without any overhead.

projects.name: Moderation Plugin
projects.description: A professional Minecraft moderation plugin featuring six punishment commands with multi-language support, Hypixel-inspired messaging, and persistent JSON data storage. Includes customizable language files and detailed staff notifications.
